query:
SELECT i.email, i.attendance
        FROM invitation i
        INNER JOIN event_game_vote v ON i.event_id = v.event_id AND i.email = v.email
        WHERE i.event_id = $1
            AND i.response IN ('yes', 'maybe')
            AND i.attendance IS NOT NULL
            AND v.game_id = $2
            AND v.vote = 'yes'
